title: EPISTOLA M. DeChant
html:
EPISTOLA M. DeChant

It is well known that Milwaukee's largest ancestral group is German. Imagine the plight of a doctor's secretary who has to spell and pronounce names like these all day, every day:

Greiveldinger
Griepentrog
Habersetzer
Klotzbuecher
Krautkramer
Kronschnabel
Pflughoeft
Promenschenkel
Reifschlager
Schwabenlender
Seidenstricker
Wesselschmidt
Schachtschneider

[M. DeChant, Thiensville, Wisconsin].
